text: 2 Natural Blush For a realistic - looking, goofproof flush, reach for a creamy blush stick. “ It ’ ll create a more youthful, seamless finish, ” says Pinkson. Use your fingers to dot a tiny amount onto the apples of your cheeks, and blend away any excess until it ’ s sheer. ( Powders require brushes — and tools run down the clock. ) Pro tip : “ Do not apply the stick directly to your face. People think that ’ s going to be faster, but it ’ s easy to overapply. Less is more, hands down. ” Sisley Phyto - Blush Twist in Papaya and Fuchsia, $ 68 each, sisley - paris. com.
